gw.api.web

Class WebUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.WebUtil

  • public class WebUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for getting useful web information statically.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ActionEventParameter
      Returns the arbitrary "parameter" string that was sent back from the browser as part of the current "action event" (like a button click or menu item selection). This is most commonly used to get the answer when an action widget has a "promptQuestion" defined.
      static String ResourcesDir
      Returns the relative URL of the localized web resources for the current user's locale and skin.
      static String ResourcesPath
      the full URL of the localized web resources for the current user's locale and skin.
      static String Skin
      Returns the current skin.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

      Constructor and Description
      WebUtil()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void copyFileToClient(String mimeType, File file)
      Send file. We disable normal Pebbles rendering and generate our own response headers and content.
      static void copyStreamToClient(String mimeType, String fileName, InputStream is, int length)
      Send "file" to web client with name "fileName" and "mimeType". We disable normal Pebbles rendering and generate our own response headers and content.
      static String getActionEventParameter()
      Returns the arbitrary "parameter" string that was sent back from the browser as part of the current "action event" (like a button click or menu item selection). This is most commonly used to get the answer when an action widget has a "promptQuestion" defined.
      static String getResourcesDir()
      Returns the relative URL of the localized web resources for the current user's locale and skin.
      static String getResourcesPath()
      static String getSkin()

    • Field Detail

      • ActionEventParameter

        String ActionEventParameter
        Returns the arbitrary "parameter" string that was sent back from the browser as part of the current "action event" (like a button click or menu item selection). This is most commonly used to get the answer when an action widget has a "promptQuestion" defined.

      • ResourcesDir

        String ResourcesDir
        Returns the relative URL of the localized web resources for the current user's locale and skin.

      • ResourcesPath

        String ResourcesPath
        the full URL of the localized web resources for the current user's locale and skin.

      • Skin

        String Skin
        Returns the current skin.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WebUtil

        WebUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • copyFileToClient

        void copyFileToClient(String mimeType,
                    File file)
        Send file. We disable normal Pebbles rendering and generate our own response headers and content.
        Parameters:
        mimeType - the mime type of the content
        file - the file to send to the user

      • copyStreamToClient

        void copyStreamToClient(String mimeType,
                      String fileName,
                      InputStream is,
                      int length)
        Send "file" to web client with name "fileName" and "mimeType". We disable normal Pebbles rendering and generate our own response headers and content.
        Parameters:
        mimeType - the mime type of the document
        fileName - the name this will be saved as by the user if they want it saved
        is - the input stream
        length - the length or -1 to not bother with that header

      • getActionEventParameter

        String getActionEventParameter()
        Returns the arbitrary "parameter" string that was sent back from the browser as part of the current "action event" (like a button click or menu item selection). This is most commonly used to get the answer when an action widget has a "promptQuestion" defined.
        Returns:
        the action event's parameter, or null if there's no current action event or if that event doesn't have a parameter.

      • getResourcesDir

        String getResourcesDir()
        Returns the relative URL of the localized web resources for the current user's locale and skin.
        Returns:

      • getResourcesPath

        String getResourcesPath()
        Returns:
        the full URL of the localized web resources for the current user's locale and skin.

      • getSkin

        String getSkin()
        Returns the current skin.
        Returns:
